CustomField.formula: IF (Contract_End_Date__c < No_Price_Increase_Through__c || No_Price_Increase_Through__c != NULL , Renewal_Base_Price__c , IF (Renewal_Pricing_Entry__r.Percent_Increase__c > Billing_Contract__r.Renewal_Increase_Cap_Percentage__c && Billing_Contract__r.Renewal_Increase_Cap_Percentage__c <>NULL, ((Billing_Contract__r.Renewal_Increase_Cap_Percentage__c * Renewal_Base_Price__c) + Renewal_Base_Price__c), ((Renewal_Pricing_Entry__r.Percent_Increase__c * Renewal_Base_Price__c) + Renewal_Base_Price__c) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Base price per unit after annual % increase (if applicable)
CustomField.label: Next Renewal Amount (per unit)
